erp_id = #{erpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update house_rent_house set erp_id = #{erpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usage_status = #{usageStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = mapper.select:
select h.shelving_id, h.erp_id, h.house_id, usage_status, h.title, content, previous_rent_price, rent_price, area, usage_id, shi, appraise_count, ting, wei, rent_type_id, orientation_no, tags, payfor_way, storey, storey_count, house_vervical_location, decoration_id, decoration_time, time_to_see, browsed, h.daikan, h.sortindex, h.community_id, publisher_id, furniture, haslift, h.lastmodified, h.lastsync, property, primaryflag, focusflag, quality, haskey, schoolregionflag, subwayregionflag, lastupdatecontent, homepage_recommand_flag, yangtai, h.deleteflag, homepage_recommand_time, toErpSynFlag, house_priority, exclusiveflag, h.cover_image, h.pic_count, cc.county_name, cc.erp_id as countyId, hc.community_name, hc.community_no, hc.community_address, ccw.name as cbdWsiteName, ccw.website_id, bb.agent_name, bb.telephone, bb.photograph_path FROM house_rent_house h INNER JOIN house_community hc ON (hc.erp_id=h.community_id ) INNER JOIN common_county cc ON (cc.erp_id=hc.region_id) INNER JOIN common_cbd ccb ON ( ccb.erp_id = hc.business_circle_id) INNER JOIN common_cbd_website ccw ON (ccw.website_id = ccb.belong_to) INNER JOIN b_broker bb ON (bb.erp_id = h.publisher_id)
INNER JOIN house_community_subway_station_mapping hcssm ON (hcssm.community_id=hc.erp_id) INNER JOIN common_subway_station css ON (css.erp_id=hcssm.subway_station_id)
INNER JOIN house_community_subway_station_mapping hcssm ON (hcssm.community_id=hc.erp_id) INNER JOIN common_subway_station css ON (css.erp_id=hcssm.subway_station_id AND css.erp_id=#{subway_station_id[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INNER JOIN common_subway cs ON (cs.erp_id=css.station_line_id AND cs.erp_id=#{station_line_id[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INNER JOIN house_community_subway_station_mapping hcssm ON (hcssm.community_id=hc.erp_id) INNER JOIN common_subway_station css ON (css.erp_id=hcssm.subway_station_id)
AND (hcssm.distance BETWEEN #{subwayDistance[0]} AND #{subwayDistance[1]})
AND ( rent_price BETWEEN #{rent_price[0], jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{rent_price[1], jdbcType=VARCHAR} rent_price=#{rent_price[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
AND ( area BETWEEN #{area[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{area[1], jdbcType=VARCHAR} area=#{area[0], jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
AND ( shi BETWEEN #{shi[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{shi[1], jdbcType=VARCHAR} shi=#{shi[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
AND ( decoration_time BETWEEN #{complate_year[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{complate_year[1],jdbcType=VARCHAR} decoration_time=#{complate_year[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
AND ( orientation_no=#{orientation_no[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
AND ( decoration_id=#{decoration_id[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
AND ( tags like '%#{tags[0],jdbcType=VARCHAR}%')
AND (cc.erp_id = #{countyId[0]})
AND (ccb.belong_to = #{cbdId[0]})
AND (hc.erp_id = #{community[0]})
AND (rent_type_id = #{rentType[0]} )
AND (furniture & #{furniture[0]} = #{furniture[0]} )
AND (h.house_id != #{notEqualHouseId[0]})
AND (hc.erp_id = #{communityErpId[0]})
AND (h.house_id = #{homePageBySearchField[0]}
OR cc.erp_id in
#{listItem}
OR ccw.website_id in
#{listItem}
OR hc.erp_id in
#{listItem}
OR css.erp_id in
#{listItem}
)
AND ccw.website_id in #{listItem}
AND (ccb.belong_to = #{hzzfCbdId[0]})
h.publisher_id = #{publisher_id[0]}
AND (h.storey_count BETWEEN #{floor[0]} AND #{floor[1]})
AND (h.house_vervical_location = #{vervicalLocation[0]})
GROUP BY h.shelving_id
ORDER BY ${orderby[0]}

select
distinct
from house_rent_house
order by ${orderByClause}

select h.shelving_id, h.erp_id, h.house_id, usage_status, h.title, content, previous_rent_price, rent_price, area, usage_id, shi, appraise_count, ting, wei, rent_type_id, h.orientation_no, tags, payfor_way, storey, storey_count, house_vervical_location, decoration_id, decoration_time, time_to_see, browsed, h.daikan, h.sortindex, h.community_id, publisher_id, furniture, haslift, h.lastmodified, h.lastsync, property, primaryflag, focusflag, quality, haskey, schoolregionflag, subwayregionflag, lastupdatecontent, homepage_recommand_flag, yangtai, h.deleteflag, homepage_recommand_time, toErpSynFlag, house_priority, exclusiveflag, h.cover_image, cc.county_name, hc.community_no, hc.community_name, ccw.name as cbdWsiteName, cc.erp_id as countyId, bb.agent_name, bb.telephone, ccw.website_id, bb.photograph_path as photographPath, hc.community_address , cd.decoration_name as decoration_name, co.orientation_name as orientation_name FROM house_rent_house h INNER JOIN house_community hc ON (hc.erp_id=h.community_id ) INNER JOIN common_county cc ON (cc.erp_id=hc.region_id) INNER JOIN common_cbd ccb ON ( ccb.erp_id = hc.business_circle_id) INNER JOIN common_cbd_website ccw ON (ccw.website_id = ccb.belong_to) INNER JOIN b_broker bb ON (bb.erp_id = h.publisher_id) LEFT JOIN common_decoration_type cd ON h.decoration_id = cd.erp_id LEFT JOIN common_orientations co ON co.orientation_no = h.orientation_no WHERE h.deleteflag = 0 AND h.house_id = #{_parameter}
